reviewText: Didn't work in any DVD player or bluray I could find
Was not formatted for standard American DVD players. It says so in the description, but somehow I managed to overlook that before purchasing.
The movies won't play in DVD player. Says no disc in player.
This collection is not viewable on my dvd player. My player is the common one used in the US.
They don't tell you these cannot be played in a normal USA DVD player until after purchased.
Couldn't watch them do to origin read read read !!
Work on computer, still my daughter loves watching.

Be sure to read features and details about these DVDs. You need a region specific DVD player and compatible tv. I Gave my 3 year old grand daughter DVDs for Christmas that she can't watch. Lesson learned for me. The only reason I give it one star is just so I can submit my review!
